Effect: Create an ice block and slide across, crashing into Close range. Leaves a trail of ice behind.
Poison spray! Can be used repeatedly if you sacrifice defenses/movement while active; keep spraying!
A weapon for the bold! If this hits a target, downshift your next two Bravery rolls.
Huge gun fires a rail blast! Can spend 1 Sense to remove Slow and add Accurate.
Area restored to original state, removing all summoned objects, elements, and hazards.
A small ice mine! If something touches it, it freezes everything Close for 2 Piercing damage.
Near area features animate and briefly attack all targets (swinging, crushing, etc) Close to them.
Electrified chain that stuns and pulls a foe into Close range.
Grenade explodes in a flash. Briefly stops enemy movement, reveals hidden foes in range.
Grows a poison lily that starts emitting gas. All Close to it upshift their attacks.
Hovering gravity orb that makes the target extremely heavy, cracking the ground under them!
Gravity intensifies, sending everything in range flying in 1 range band direction of your choice.
A large wall that shoots a magical beam. Can instead be used to downshift a Stamina defense
Legendary blade cuts defenses! X = target Body. Ignores Guards. Spend 1 Bravery to upshift defense.
Ghostly double! Body turns invincible; ghost shares HP, disappears when damaged. It can't go past Far.
Lob an anchor to crush anything below. Can instead be used to temporarily lock yourself in place.
Throw a gigantic spanner! Can also be used to power up nearby equipment.
Dead leaves zigzag forward, leaving tripping debris behind on hit.
Magic cross-bomb that explodes twice. Spend 1 Affinity to hit all Close to the target.
Wicked eye opens up and periodically fires 1 damage petrifying rays at Near targets, up to 5 times.
Many sturdy staffs rise from the ground; can be used as a small wall, prop, handle, etc. Difficult to break.
For the noble! Spend 1 Bravery to instead add +2 hits and Piercing to an ally’s attack roll.
Ignore secondary effects of a single damaging chip. Spend 1 Coding to refresh this chip.
Legendary blade cuts data! Deals +2 damage if target’s element has been disabled or changed.
Reckless blast also hits an additional chosen Close target. Spend X Sense to choose X more targets.
Slot in a Hazard chip, fire it as a Shot chip. It gains +1 dmg, Slow, Dngr., and triggers at the target’s feet.
Reduce damage of next 2 attacks you take by half, round down. Downshift next 2 defenses to hazards.
Bouncing shell! If no damage taken: bounce to Close target until hit. X = # missed. Vanishes on 3 bounces.
Gleaming blade! Damage depends on range to target. Close: 2x2 Dmg; Near: 2 Dmg; Far: 2 Dmg + Slow.
Targeting reticles appear everywhere in range. After a delay, missiles rain down and hammer the earth.
Coats the floor in a pool of poison on a miss.
Used to contain a Virus. Must be in the Folder to tame a Virus. When in combat, slot in to summon Virus.
Your next attack roll mimics the secondary effects of the last two damaging chips used.
Fragile lily poisons a Near target. While active, they take 1 extra damage whenever damaged.
The server sector temporarily sees you as the admin. The area may not be altered (summons, hazards, elements, MapEdit, etc) without your permission.
Data-nullifying claw that cuts through code. Disable 1 per hit for 5 rolls: Element, Powers, NCPs, Folder, one Skill, PET connection, or movement.
Recall 3 elements of Navis you’ve defeated before. They, plus your element, coalesce into a destructive wave ahead. All elements linger afterwards.
If your Affinity is <4, it is now 4. Can use Affinity as defense. Gain another +1 Affinity whenever you’re attacked by an enemy. Lasts 7 rolls.
For the next 3 rolls, every stat + skill reduction becomes an addition instead. May spend HP to add that many additional rolls (max 5).
Memories of your friends inspire you, channeling your power into a final blow! Spend up to 5 Bond Points to add that much damage.
Summon 10 animated 1 HP dolls around you, supplementing your actions. Can sacrifice up to 4 dolls per roll to add that many hits. (Use before rolling)
A giant cannon fueled by blood and anger! X = missing HP (Max 5). If you’re at or below 2 HP, upshift defenses against this chip.
Chemical spray over an area and envelop enemies! Enemies must break out, losing 1 HP every failure. Allies standing in it heal 1 HP per roll.
Purple flames feeding on emotions. X = Their total Bond Levels (max 10). If this would delete a Navi, pick 1: you operate them, you take their place.
Anchor breaks everything below. Anything Close on impact is shackled to the anchor and gradually drug under into the abyss. Hard Strength to break free.
Absorb in, then spew out bad code. X = Allies’ skill reductions (max 10). Targets (and you) copy all highest reduction values. All allies remove reductions.
Permanently erase a happy memory you have. It forms an infallible barrier around an ally. For 7 rolls,they ignore <4 damage, status changes, and hazards.
Navi’s chassis burns to ash, multiplying infinitely. Foes start drowning, upshifting rolls. Move allies any area in range instantly. Lasts [Daemon Bond]+2 rolls.
Sacrifice a limb. It rips apart, pieces flying out to shred the server and all caught in it. Damaged targets are blinded for a long time, even after jack-out.
For the next [Daemon Bond+1] rolls, dice rolls are flipped: rather than needing to roll over for success, you roll under. Your body goes numb afterwards.
Spend a portion of your core to instantly restore a recently-deleted ally back to perfect state. Your data will be purged in 7+X days. X = Daemon bond level.
Pick any target, living or dead. Until you find them, you will know their location, status, feelings, and thoughts. One thing can be whispered into their mind.
Your mind blanks. A large wall manifests in front of you, firing a dark beam. Your thoughts are written on it. The wall will stay there forever, no matter what.
Invoke a terrible storm in the server. Pick 1: Deadly cyclone, instant flood, lethal icestorm, toxic miasma, or searing firestorm. The server will never recover.
Wicked scythe purges code! Your choice stat of target becomes 1, related skills are 0. On delete, target is erased from all memory databanks in the server.
Until jack-out, all your peers in range endure echoes of your feelings. They must roll Hard Bravery, else their thoughts will happily conform with yours. Finally.
